concept.title: Access the Marketing Cloud
concept.shortdesc: Learn how to access the Marketing Cloud using your Adobe ID.

conbody.p: To access the Marketing Cloud, you must link your solution credentials with your Adobe ID. If you do not have an Adobe ID, you can create one prior to linking your accounts.
For example, in Analytics and Social, link (or map) the Company, Username, and Password values to your Adobe ID.

li.p: Verify that your company has been provisioned.
Administrators perform this step. Provisioning enables users to link their solution credentials to the Marketing Cloud Adobe ID.
In your solution, click Join Marketing Cloud.
This button launches a wizard that helps you link your solution credentials to your Adobe ID.
Sign in and start using the Marketing Cloud.
After you link your accounts, you can access all of your Adobe Digital Marketing products and services at <your company>.marketing.adobe.com.

conbody.p: You can also link accounts using on the Organizations page.
